name: StrideFlow Running Shoes
description: Lightweight road-running shoes with breathable mesh and cushioned midsole. Great for daily training and long runs.

name: TrailBlaze Hiking Boots
description: Durable waterproof boots designed for rocky trails and wet conditions. Superior ankle support.

name: AeroFit Sports T-Shirt
description: Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool during workouts. Classic fit with reflective logo.

name: FlexPro Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip, extra-cushioned mat perfect for yoga, pilates, and stretching routines.

name: HydraPeak Insulated Bottle 1L
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated bottle keeps drinks cold for 24h and hot for 12h. BPA-free.

name: PulseBand Fitness Tracker
description: Tracks steps, heart rate, sleep. 7-day battery life with app notifications and swim proof.

name: ZenBuds Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact earbuds with clear sound and touch controls. Noise-isolating tips, USB-C charging.

name: PowerCore Adjustable Dumbbells (Pair)
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells range 2–24 kg per hand. Quick dial system.

name: ComfyCloud Running Socks (3-Pack)
description: Cushioned arch support, blister-resistant material, breathable mesh zones for runners.

name: CitySprint Running Shoes
description: Neutral road runners with responsive foam. Ideal for tempo sessions and 5–10K races.

name: AquaPro Sports Water Bottle 750ml
description: Leak-proof flip cap, BPA-free, fits bike cages. Great for running and gym.

name: SwiftRun Lightweight Trainers
description: Featherweight trainers for daily jogs and casual wear. Breathable knit upper.

name: ThermaShield Performance Hoodie
description: Warm yet breathable hoodie for cool-weather runs. Soft lining, reflective trims.

name: AeroDry Sleeveless Tank Top
description: Quick-dry fabric, racerback cut, ideal for gym and summer runs.

name: GripMax Speed Jump Rope
description: Adjustable steel cable rope with smooth bearings for double-unders.

name: SteelCore Kettlebell 16kg
description: Powder-coated surface for secure grip, perfect for swings and squats.

name: HydraPeak Insulated Bottle 500ml
description: Compact insulated bottle for everyday use. Keeps drinks cold for 18h.

name: SoundPulse Sport Headband Headphones
description: Sweat-resistant headband with integrated low-leakage speakers for outdoor runs.

name: TrailGuard Ankle Gaiters
description: Keeps out debris and water on trails. Lightweight, quick-attach design.

name: UltraFlex Compression Tights
description: Graduated compression for muscle support and recovery. 4-way stretch.
